title: 2014 Philadelphia Union season
text:
The 2014 <a href="Philadelphia%20Union">Philadelphia Union</a> season is the club's fifth season of existence, competing in <a href="Major%20League%20Soccer">Major League Soccer</a>, the top flight of American soccer. The club was initially managed by <a href="John%20Hackworth">John Hackworth</a>, in his third season (second full season) with the club. In June, Hackworth was fired from his role as head coach and assistant coach <a href="Jim%20Curtin">Jim Curtin</a> was promoted on an interim basis. At the conclusion of the season, Curtin was officially made permanent head coach, making him the third head coach in the club's history. The 2014 season also marked the first time the Union reached a competition finals, finishing runners-up in the <a href="2014%20U.S.%20Open%20Cup">2014 U.S. Open Cup</a> to <a href="Seattle%20Sounders%20FC">Seattle Sounders FC</a>.
2014 roster.
"As of April 20, 2014."
